version_description: Miscellaneous bugfixes and enhancements
Miscellaneous bugfixes and enhancements
Miscellaneous bugfixes and enhancements
Miscellaneous bugfixes and enhancements

Dropbox integration – Download books stored in your Dropbox account without leaving Bluefire Reader! Just tap Library in the top nav bar and choose Dropbox from from the menu.
Integration of the Open Dyslexic font, created to help readers with Dyslexia
Updated themes, including support for sepia mode for PDF files
Integration of RMSDK 10 and the latest OpenSSL library code
Please remember to update your reviews. We appreciate your support!
